comment: sir can you do some checkers opening variotions please(videos).
reply_replies: Hello Mathew Mathew, the idea of our channel is to teach beginners, intermediate & advanced players, how to win up to 90% of the time using the 13 strategies, which are explained in our 1st video How to play checkers & win 90% of the time followed by daily live games with real time commentary on how I win, lose or draw using the 13 strategies. By following & studying our videos you will learn the basic strategies to make you a better player, then you can concentrate on learning other openings. If you want to learn the various opening then I suggest you go to a channel called azcheckers or checkercycle. They discuss the various opening & responses in theory, but no actual live games or real live situations.
Anytime!
